bug.author: cottrell
bug.summary: No simple function optimisation examples for tensorflow 2.0?
bug.description: I don't see any simple function optimisation example for tensorflow 2.0. Something like log(x) ** 2 could be good.

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/cottrell>@cottrell</denchmark-link> Currently there are several <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/alpha>tutorials</denchmark-link> covering major concepts of TF broadly. In future, more tutorials will be added. Please stay tuned. I am closing the issue. Thanks!
